text: Map of Zambia This is a list of airports in Zambia, sorted by location. Zambia, officially the Republic of Zambia, is a landlocked country in Southern Africa. The neighboring countries are the Democratic Republic of the Congo to the north, Tanzania to the northeast, Malawi to the east, Mozambique, Zimbabwe, Botswana and Namibia to the south, and Angola to the west. Zambia is divided into ten provinces. The capital city is Lusaka. __NOTOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline !
